description: Situated on the Via Emilia, this elegant, owner-run restaurant has for decades been renowned for its top-quality regional cuisine with an updated twist, as well as its reinterpreted fish specialities. Our inspector very much enjoyed the cuisine here, with a particular mention for the home-made pastas and excellent wine selection.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
